recipesJson.name: Banana & Cinnamon Biscuit #diydownunderaugustchallenge
recipesJson.author: JoeRoots
recipesJson.description:
Banana Biscuit sprinkled with cinnamon Sugar 

I almost always have some sort of idea, of a road I want to go when making a new recipe, but in this case I was so afraid that the ingredients I used wasn‚Äôt something that Sydney vapours had, since my last recipe had FA ‚Äúup‚Äù which they didn‚Äôt have, that i went through they‚Äôre site looking for inspiration. 

I hadn‚Äôt used tpa banana cream in a long time, and I actually didn‚Äôt enjoy banana vapes since Wayne had that whole week about bananas, which where when i purchased the banana cream. 

But... when I saw that on SV site, i knew I wanted to make some kinda cookie. 

I went with the inw biscuit because it is so damn delicious. It‚Äôs almost like a cookie custard to me, and with that and the cream from the banana cream, it was the perfect match to make a "raw" cookie dough with mashed banana in it. 

The cinnamon Sugar is doing 2 things. It is the sprinkle on top, but it also makes the raw cookie dough into a nice crispy baked cookie...

Let it sit for a good 2-3 days and enjoy yourself a easy cheap Vape. It doesn‚Äôt have to be so damn complex everytime, and I really love that with this challenge üëç

Thanks to Cathy wood for making me do these notes. I know I means a lot to me when I‚Äôm looking at others recipes, so of course I should do em my self. Not sometimes, but always!
